content:
Currently Statistic and OrderedDistribution pages say "Dosage Instruction Detail" in their first tab. I want to change it to "Statistic" and "OrderedDistribution" respectively. To make this change I need to switch from "diheader" in the source HTML to a new header string. I see that in order to do that I need to add new code to PageProcessor.java in the tools folder. Am I allowed to make changes to that file, or do I have to have someone else change it for me?

http://build.fhir.org/statistic.html
http://build.fhir.org/ordereddistribution.html
well, you can make the change, if you get it right ;-)
